Container.Name: papermerge
Container.Overview: Papermerge(https://www.papermerge.com/) is an open source document management system (DMS) primarily designed for archiving and retrieving your digital documents. Instead of having piles of paper documents all over your desk, office or drawers - you can quickly scan them and configure your scanner to directly upload to Papermerge DMS."
Container.Changes:
### 2022-07-15 - Don't install development python packages
### 2021-04-13 - Handle upstream stapler change
### 2021-03-13 - Fixed mglib dependency per issue 32
### 2021-02-25 - Updated dependencies for v2
### 2021-02-07 - Support external MySQL/PSQL DBs.
### 2021-02-01 - Add redis.
### 2020-12-09 - Fix locales.
### 2020-08-08 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: Storage location for all papermerge data files.

Config.Name: REDIS_URL
Config.Description: Specify an external redis instance to use. Can optionally include a port (`redis:6379`) and/or db (`redis/foo`). If left blank or not included, will use a built-in redis instance. If changed after initial setup will also require manual modification of /config/settings.py
